long_description: Protect feet from shoe friction and pressure with this soft, smooth cotton flannel-covered foam padding. Surrounds and protects corns, calluses and blisters from pressure and rubbing. Includes: 2 self-adhesive trim-to-fit strips. To use: bathe and dry feet, cut adhesive foam in donut shape to fit around blister, corn or callus, remove backing and apply.
short_description: Protect feet from shoe friction and pressure with this soft, smooth cotton flannel-covered foam padding.
